abstract.t: This draft proposes a simple extension to HTTP, using a newset of headers, which can significantly reduce the network trafficused for sending pages containing advertising banners and otherrelated content. We begin by describing the problems generated by theuse of 'cache-busting' techniques today and why the Hit-meteringscheme [RFC2227], by itself, may not be adequate. We will thendescribe a new scheme which relies on collaboration between thecontent providers and the Internet Service Providers (ISPs).
